about_the_game:
Tiny-Fi: The Captivating World of Survival, Adventure, and Shrinking

Tiny-Fi is an exciting survival game that blends sci-fi and adventure genres. Players control physicist Alain Feynman, who has shrunk due to a teleportation experiment gone wrong, and must survive in the attic of a gigantic house. This extraordinary adventure allows you to explore the dangerous and captivating world inside an ordinary house.

Rich Story

Control Alain Feynman, who shrank during a teleportation experiment. Discover how Alain ended up in this situation and embark on a challenging journey guided by Dr. Evelyn Morgan to return to his original size. Along the way, uncover deep secrets about yourself and your surroundings.

Semi-Open World

The attic offers new secrets and challenges to discover. Solve the mysteries of the attic by navigating through mysterious corridors, dangerous enemies, and challenging parkours. Enhance Alain’s abilities to reach previously inaccessible areas, discover new points, and open paths that were previously blocked.

Crafting and Survival

Collect materials to craft necessary items and weapons for survival. Build ladders, construct shelters, and manage resources to continue the survival struggle.

Day-Night Cycle

The dynamic day-night cycle affects the game’s atmosphere and challenges. Face more dangerous enemies at night and explore the environment more safely during the day.

Combat Mechanics

Use different weapons and tactics to fight various enemies as Alain. Improve your combat skills, craft powerful weapons, and defeat enemies.

Impressive Graphics

Immerse yourself in a detailed and atmospheric game world powered by Unreal Engine 5. Elevate your gaming experience with realistic visuals and immersive sound design.

Story

At the final stage of a teleportation experiment he has been working on for years, Alain Feynman finds himself shrunk in the attic of a house due to a mistake. While struggling to survive in this gigantic world, Alain searches for a way to return to normal with the guidance of Dr. Evelyn Morgan. Facing different challenges and dangers at various points in the attic, Alain tries to reach the garden by solving the house’s mysteries. Discover why Alain ended up in this situation and the truths behind past events.

Tiny-Fi offers a unique experience to action and adventure enthusiasts with its captivating story, deep game mechanics, and enchanting atmosphere. Immerse yourself in this magical world and join Alain’s adventure!

name: Tiny-Fi
short_description: Your house is a vast and dangerous place, especially when you've been shrunk to the size of a bug! In Tiny-Fi, join Alain's struggle to survive in the attic. Can you make it out of the house in this atmospheric adventure? Your home has never felt so big!
